src:
Rekomendasi Makan Siang
Makan Siang Paling Enak Jajan Sate Ayam Ponorogo di Sini
04 Nov 2019, 05:04 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Foto: instagram

Jakarta - Sate ayam Ponorogo dengan nasi putih atau lontong cocok jadi menu santap siang. Apalagi ditambah dengan bumbu kacang yang gurih manis. Bikin makan jadi makin lahap.Ciri khas sate Ponorogo terletak pada bentuk irisan satenya yang memanjang. Beda dengan sate Madura yang dipotong dadu. Bentuk irisan memanjang inilah yang membuat sate Ponorogo semakin empuk dan bumbunya meresap.Mau makan sate Ponorogo yang enak d Jakarta? Yuk sambangi beberapa warung makan ini.1. Sate Ponorogo Bintaro


Foto: istimewa

Warung sate Ponorogo yang satu ini bisa disambangi kalau Anda sedang ada di kawasan Bintaro. Warung sederhana ini menawarkan menu utama sate Ponorogo yang mantap dengan guyuran bumbu kacang yang gurih creamy.Seporsi sate Ponorogo isi 10 tusuk ini juga bisa disantap dengan nasi atau lontong. Selain sate ayam, ada juga sate kambing yang tak kalah juara. Penyajiannya dilengkapi bumbu kecap dengan irisan cabai rawit dan tomat segar. Mantap!Sate Ponorogo BintaroJl. Bintaro Utama 3A No. 31Pondok Karya, Pondok ArenTangerangTelepon (021) 73882106Baca juga : Mau Jajan Sate? Intip Dulu 9 Sate Nusantara yang Enak Ini2. Warung BerkahSate ayam Ponorogo juga bisa dinikmati di Warung Berkah yang ada di kawasan Kebon Jeruk Jakarta Barat. Sate di sini dimasak sesuai pesanan jadi dijamin akan tersaji hangat saat siap dinikmati.Irisan satenya terbilang panjang dan tak pelit jadi bisa puas memanjakan lidah sekaligus perut. Menu sate Ponorogo memang jadi yang andalan di sini tapi kalau mau makan yang berkuah, Anda bisa juga memesan soto ayam Semarang.Warung BerkahJl.Pos Pengumben (Komplek Bulog) Blok A No. 5Kebon Jeruk, Jakarta BaratTelepon : 0819447026893. Sate Ponorogo Bang Ricko


Ilustrasi sate ayam ponorogo Foto: istimewa

Sate Ponorogo Bang Ricko bukan hanya menawarkan sensasi makan sate enak tapi juga makan sambil menikmati pemandangan pantai. Ya, lokasinya di pesisir pantai Ancol menjadikan tempat ini layak disambangi saat siang maupun malam hari.Sate ayam juga dilengkapi dengan usus dan kulit. Sate empuk dengan daging iris ini juga bisa dinikmati bersama nasi atau lontong. Uniknya lagi, sate ayam Ponorogo bisa juga dipilih mau disajikan dengan bumbu kacang atau bumbu kecap.Sate Ponorogo Bang RickoJl.Lodan Timur Raya No. 7, AncolPademangan, Jakarta UtaraTelepon : 0813086152674. Sate Ponorogo NyamlengBukan hanya di warung makan, sate Ponorogo juga bisa dinikmati saat ada mal. Berlokasi di area Eat and Eat, Kota Kasablanka, sate ayam ini bisa jadi pilihan nikmat. Meski tersaji secara modern tapi rasa sate tetaplah autentik.Guyuran bumbu kacang yang creamy menambah kelezatan sate ini. Sate Ponorogo memang cenderung memiliki rasa yang lebih gurih manis karena sebelum dibakar, sate sudah lebih dulu dilumuri bumbu. Kalau suka pedas, sate bisa juga dilengkapi sambal yang biasa tersaji dengan wadah terpisah.Sate Ponorogo NyamlengEat and Eat Kota Kasablanka lantai 2Jl. Casablanca Kav 88, Menteng DalamJakarta SelatanBaca juga : Ayo Rek... Jajan Sate Ponorogo!5. Sate Ayam Ponorogo Bang TW


ilustrasi sate ayam ponorogo Foto: istimewa

Bergeser ke kawasan Bekasi, ada juga kedai sate Ponorogo yang enaknya bikin ketagihan. Kedai Bang TW menawarkan sate Ponorogo empuk dan enak. Harga sate di sini juga terbilang murah meriah sehingga tak perlu khawatir.Sate Ponorogo tersaji hangat dengan pelengkap nasi dan lontong. Warung yang buka dari siang hingga malam ini bisa jadi pilihan saat ingin makan sate Ponorogo sebagai menu makan siang maupun malam.Sate Ayam Ponorogo Bang TWJl. Cikedokan, Cikarang BaratBekasiTelepon 085697630313 Simak Video "Empuk Juicy Sate Kambing Khas Bogor ala Bang War"[Gambas:Video 20detik](dvs/odi)
text:
Lunch Recommendation
The Most Delicious Lunch Snacks Chicken Ponorogo Sat Here
Nov 04 2019, 05:04 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Photo: Instagram

Jakarta - Ponorogo chicken satay with white rice or rice cake suitable for a lunch menu. Moreover, coupled with savory sweet peanut sauce. It makes eating even more delicious. The signature of Ponorogo satay lies in its longitudinal shape of the satay. It's different from diced Madura satay. This elongated wedge shape makes Ponorogo satay more tender and the marinade permeates. Do you want to eat delicious Ponorogo satay in Jakarta? Let's visit some of these food stalls. Ponorogo Satay Bintaro


Photo: special

Ponorogo satay shop on this one can be visited if you are in the Bintaro area. This simple stall offers the main menu of Ponorogo satay which is great with a spicy, creamy savory peanut spice. The Ponorogo satay filling containing 10 sticks can also be eaten with rice or rice cake. In addition to chicken satay, there is also goat satay that is not less champion. The presentation is equipped with soy sauce seasoning with sliced chili and fresh tomatoes. Great! Satay Ponorogo BintaroJl. Bintaro Utama 3A No. 31Pondok Karya, Pondok Aren Tangerang Phone (021) 73882106 Also read: Want Satay Snacks? Take a peek at 9 Tasty Satay Archipelago2. Warung Berkah Sate Ponorogo can also be enjoyed at Warung Berkah in Kebon Jeruk, West Jakarta. The satay here is cooked to order so it is guaranteed to be served warm when ready to be enjoyed. The satis is fairly long and not stingy so it can be satisfied spoiling the tongue as well as the stomach. The Ponorogo satay menu is the mainstay here, but if you want to eat a soup, you can also order soto ayam Semarang.Warung BerkahJl.Pumb Pengumben (Komplek Bulog) Blok A No. 5Kebon Jeruk, West Jakarta Phone: 0819447026893. Sate Ponorogo Bang Ricko


Illustration of chicken satay ponorogo Photo: special

Ponorogo Satay Bang Ricko not only offers the sensation of eating delicious satay but also eating while enjoying the view of the beach. Yes, its location on the coast of Ancol makes this place worth a visit during the day and night. Chicken satay is also equipped with intestines and skin. This soft satay with sliced meat can also be enjoyed with rice or rice cake. Uniquely, Ponorogo chicken satay can also be selected to be served with peanut sauce or soy sauce seasoning. Ponorogo Satay Bang RickoJl.Lodan Timur Raya No. 7, AncolPademangan, North Jakarta Phone: 0813086152674. Sate Ponorogo Nyamleng Not only in food stalls, Ponorogo satay can also be enjoyed when there is a mall. Located in the Eat and Eat area, Kota Kasablanka, this chicken satay can be a delicious choice. Although presented in a modern way, the taste of satay is still authentic. The creamy peanut seasoning adds to the deliciousness of this satay. Ponorogo Satay indeed tends to have a more savory sweet taste because before it is burned, satay is already smeared with seasoning. If you like it spicy, satay can also be equipped with the usual sauce served with separate containers. Satay Ponorogo Nyamleng Eat and Eat Kota Kasablanka, 2nd floor. Casablanca Kav 88, Menteng DalamJakarta SelatanRead also: Come on Rek ... Ponorogo Satay Snacks! 5. Sate Ayam Ponorogo Bang TW


illustration of satay ayam ponorogo Photo: special

Shifting to the Bekasi area, there is also Ponorogo satay shop which is deliciously addictive. Kedai Bang TW offers Ponorogo satay soft and delicious. The price of satay here is also fairly cheap so there's no need to worry. Ponorogo satay is served warmly with rice and rice cake complement. Stalls that are open from noon to tonight can be an option when you want to eat Ponorogo satay as a lunch or dinner menu. Cikedokan, Cikarang BaratBekasiPhone 085697630313 Check out the video "Soft Juicy Sate Goat Bogor typical of Bang War" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (dvs / odi)
